title: Workflow Queue Status / İş Akışı Sırası Durumu
description: Shows workflow queue depths and pending item ages

queries.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) queue_depth, 'TOTAL' queue_type, MIN(creation_date) oldest_date FROM wf_item_activity_statuses WHERE queue_type IN ('WAITING', 'NOTIFIED')

doc_hint: Shows workflow queue depths. High WAITING/NOTIFIED queues or old deferred items indicate workflow processing delays.
analysis_prompt: Check workflow queues. Report: (1) queue depths by type, (2) age of oldest pending items, (3) if deferred queue is backed up, (4) recommend investigating workflow processes.
